myPKJkOmaEuKWQEYY.name: Directional
myPKJkOmaEuKWQEYY.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

mx2rbacbX-HumnDnI.name: Tough Skin
mx2rbacbX-HumnDnI.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

mtRR5hcdrgWKNGq1L.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

mteIAv59IRpmIBYX-.name: Oxygen Storage
mteIAv59IRpmIBYX-.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mpBq2KWDOfyeyBVI4.name: Oxygen Storage
mpBq2KWDOfyeyBVI4.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

meBnXH6k5-hqMnbMH.name: Oxygen Storage
meBnXH6k5-hqMnbMH.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

m25RI6pL4d__7xI1G.name: Oxygen Storage
m25RI6pL4d__7xI1G.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mmSfNN8hi3YKwjkgR.name: Oxygen Storage
mmSfNN8hi3YKwjkgR.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

mNy55cM3vC4FDp1c9.name: Diffuse
mNy55cM3vC4FDp1c9.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mouvf4FrsvEdKy494.name: Homogenous
mouvf4FrsvEdKy494.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mIKv8gSVDc-weVI5K.name: No Blood
mIKv8gSVDc-weVI5K.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mQKIkTPEWObb28ThQ.name: No Brain
mQKIkTPEWObb28ThQ.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mZAnrqOhmigM4SvZ-.name: No Eyes
mZAnrqOhmigM4SvZ-.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mEocU0xkLEuGEp1Zh.name: No Head
mEocU0xkLEuGEp1Zh.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

m81KE2heK6HwkV78f.name: No Neck
m81KE2heK6HwkV78f.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mDtDtge8h68lUO1jM.name: No Vitals
mDtDtge8h68lUO1jM.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

m12iqFDuyqHvHAR4m.name: Unliving
m12iqFDuyqHvHAR4m.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
